short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official chrome extension for your AdPerformance dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adperformance (www.adperformance.org) is a monitoring and reporting platform for internet based marketing campaigns. This is browser extension aims to show a quick overview of metrics and available notifications to the user. User will be able to choose which push notifications is preferable to receive. This extension expects and active user account and will be functional only for the registered users of adperformance.org.
